Title: Shor in the City
Writer: Krishna D.K. (story & screenplay), Raj Nidimoru (story & screenplay), Sita Menon (story & screenplay), Sita Menon (dialogue), Chintan Gandhi (dialogue), Sameer (lyrics), Nishu (lyrics)
Actors: Sendhil Ramamurthy, Tusshar Kapoor, Nikhil Dwivedi, Preeti Desai
Plot: Various residents and career-criminals face challenges in crime-laden Mumbai.
